headline: Fox (NASDAQ:FOXA) Is Due To Pay A Dividend Of $0.27

headline: Fox Corp. acquires Red Seat Ventures, terms not disclosed
summary: Fox Corporation announced its acquisition of Red Seat Ventures, a business in the creator economy that powers talent across a range of genres as they build their direct-to-consumer media businesses. Red Seat Ventures will operate as a standalone entity within FOX‘s Tubi Media Group. Paul Cheesbrough, CEO of Tubi Media Group, assumes the role of Chairman, Red Seat Ventures.
